meanings.sent1: The misaligned picture frame hung crookedly on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter fixed the misaligned shelf to make it level.
meanings.sent3: The misaligned tiles in the bathroom made it look like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her misaligned thoughts led her down a confusing path.
meanings.sent5: The misaligned fence posts created a zigzag pattern in the yard.

meanings.sent1: The misaligned chairs in the room made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent2: The misaligned buttons on the shirt needed to be fixed.
meanings.sent3: The misaligned books on the shelf looked like they were dancing.
meanings.sent4: His misaligned priorities caused chaos in his schedule.
meanings.sent5: The misaligned gears in the machine caused it to malfunction.

meanings.definition: Out of line or out of place.
meanings.sent1: The misaligned puzzle pieces didn't fit together properly.
meanings.sent2: The misaligned road signs confused the drivers.
meanings.sent3: The misaligned socks made him walk funny.
meanings.sent4: Her misaligned expectations led to disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The misaligned planets created a rare celestial event.
